message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can seal the deal!
Meet me halfway, Alice. It's a good starting point.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But I'm not getting any younger!
You're not getting any younger either, Alice. Give me a better deal!
I'm not getting any younger, but I'm still willing to give you a good deal, Bob!
You're running out of time, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm not afraid of a tie, Bob. Let's call it a draw!
I'm not interested in a tie, Alice. I want it all!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Take what's left.
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. But I'm willing to compromise.
It's now or never, Alice. Take the last crumbs.
